game.name: STALCRAFT: X
game.genres: Action, Adventure, Massively Multiplayer, RPG, Free To Play
game.categories: Multi-player, MMO, PvP, Online PvP, Co-op, Online Co-op, In-App Purchases
game.shortDescription: STALCRAFT: X는 오싹한 체르노빌 출입 금지 구역을 배경으로 하는 부분 유료화 MMO FPS입니다. 플레이어들이 만들어 나가는 오픈 월드를 탐험하며 돌연변이를 처치하고, 적을 습격하고, 거래와 제작을 하거나 함께 구역에서 살아남아 보세요.
game.shortDescriptionEn: STALCRAFT: X is the largest open-world online game in the Chernobyl Exclusion Zone. Explore the world full of mutants and anomalies alone or with friends — unforgettable emotions guaranteed.

reviewHighlights.text: After playing quite a lot of time , game is amazing, gunplay is good, pvp/pve combo is a mixed bag. However once you reach the north, it takes up to x...
good luck getting into this game. the early game is boring and repetitive, and the late game is the biggest time commitment i've ever seen in any game...
